00058 GlyphCacheBLF *blf_glyph_cache_find(FontBLF *font, int size, int dpi)
00059 {
00060     GlyphCacheBLF *p;
00061 
00062     p = (GlyphCacheBLF *)font->cache.first;
00063     while (p) {
00064         if (p->size == size && p->dpi == dpi)
00065             return p;
00066         p = p->next;
00067     }
00068     return NULL;
00069 }
00070 
00071 /* Create a new glyph cache for the current size and dpi. */
00072 GlyphCacheBLF *blf_glyph_cache_new(FontBLF *font)
00073 {
00074     GlyphCacheBLF *gc;
00075 
00076     gc = (GlyphCacheBLF *)MEM_callocN(sizeof(GlyphCacheBLF), "blf_glyph_cache_new");
00077     gc->next = NULL;
00078     gc->prev = NULL;
00079     gc->size = font->size;
00080     gc->dpi = font->dpi;
00081 
00082     memset(gc->glyph_ascii_table, 0, sizeof(gc->glyph_ascii_table));
00083     memset(gc->bucket, 0, sizeof(gc->bucket));
00084 
00085     gc->textures = (GLuint *)malloc(sizeof(GLuint)*256);
00086     gc->ntex = 256;
00087     gc->cur_tex = -1;
00088     gc->x_offs = 0;
00089     gc->y_offs = 0;
00090     gc->pad = 3;
00091 
00092     gc->num_glyphs = font->face->num_glyphs;
00093     gc->rem_glyphs = font->face->num_glyphs;
00094     gc->ascender = ((float)font->face->size->metrics.ascender) / 64.0f;
00095     gc->descender = ((float)font->face->size->metrics.descender) / 64.0f;
00096 
00097     if (FT_IS_SCALABLE(font->face)) {
00098         gc->max_glyph_width = (float)((font->face->bbox.xMax - font->face->bbox.xMin) *
00099                                       (((float)font->face->size->metrics.x_ppem) /
00100                                        ((float)font->face->units_per_EM)));
00101 
00102         gc->max_glyph_height = (float)((font->face->bbox.yMax - font->face->bbox.yMin) *
00103                                        (((float)font->face->size->metrics.y_ppem) /
00104                                         ((float)font->face->units_per_EM)));
00105     }
00106     else {
00107         gc->max_glyph_width = ((float)font->face->size->metrics.max_advance) / 64.0f;
00108         gc->max_glyph_height = ((float)font->face->size->metrics.height) / 64.0f;
00109     }
00110 
00111     gc->p2_width = 0;
00112     gc->p2_height = 0;
00113 
00114     BLI_addhead(&font->cache, gc);
00115     return gc;
00116 }
00117 
00118 void blf_glyph_cache_clear(FontBLF *font)
00119 {
00120     GlyphCacheBLF *gc;
00121     GlyphBLF *g;
00122     int i;
00123 
00124     for (gc = font->cache.first; gc; gc = gc->next) {
00125         for (i = 0; i < 257; i++) {
00126             while (gc->bucket[i].first) {
00127                 g = gc->bucket[i].first;
00128                 BLI_remlink(&(gc->bucket[i]), g);
00129                 blf_glyph_free(g);
00130             }
00131         }
00132 
00133         memset(gc->glyph_ascii_table, 0, sizeof(gc->glyph_ascii_table));
00134     }
00135 }
00136 
00137 void blf_glyph_cache_free(GlyphCacheBLF *gc)
00138 {
00139     GlyphBLF *g;
00140     int i;
00141 
00142     for (i = 0; i < 257; i++) {
00143         while (gc->bucket[i].first) {
00144             g = gc->bucket[i].first;
00145             BLI_remlink(&(gc->bucket[i]), g);
00146             blf_glyph_free(g);
00147         }
00148     }
00149 
00150     if (gc->cur_tex+1 > 0)
00151         glDeleteTextures(gc->cur_tex+1, gc->textures);
00152     free((void *)gc->textures);
00153     MEM_freeN(gc);
00154 }
00155 
00156 static void blf_glyph_cache_texture(FontBLF *font, GlyphCacheBLF *gc)
00157 {
00158     int tot_mem, i;
00159     unsigned char *buf;
00160 
00161     /* move the index. */
00162     gc->cur_tex++;
00163 
00164     if (gc->cur_tex >= gc->ntex) {
00165         gc->ntex *= 2;
00166         gc->textures = (GLuint *)realloc((void *)gc->textures, sizeof(GLuint)*gc->ntex);
00167     }
00168 
00169     gc->p2_width = blf_next_p2((gc->rem_glyphs * gc->max_glyph_width) + (gc->pad * 2));
00170     if (gc->p2_width > font->max_tex_size)
00171         gc->p2_width = font->max_tex_size;
00172 
00173     i = (int)((gc->p2_width - (gc->pad * 2)) / gc->max_glyph_width);
00174     gc->p2_height = blf_next_p2(((gc->num_glyphs / i) + 1) * gc->max_glyph_height);
00175 
00176     if (gc->p2_height > font->max_tex_size)
00177         gc->p2_height = font->max_tex_size;
00178 
00179     tot_mem = gc->p2_width * gc->p2_height;
00180     buf = (unsigned char *)malloc(tot_mem);
00181     memset((void *)buf, 0, tot_mem);
00182 
00183     glGenTextures(1, &gc->textures[gc->cur_tex]);
00184     glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, (font->tex_bind_state = gc->textures[gc->cur_tex]));
00185     glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_S, GL_CLAMP);
00186     glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_T, GL_CLAMP);
00187     glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_NEAREST);
00188     glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_NEAREST);
00189 
00190     glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, GL_ALPHA, gc->p2_width, gc->p2_height, 0, GL_ALPHA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, buf);
00191     free((void *)buf);
00192 }
00193 
00194 GlyphBLF *blf_glyph_search(GlyphCacheBLF *gc, unsigned int c)
00195 {
00196     GlyphBLF *p;
00197     unsigned int key;
00198 
00199     key = blf_hash(c);
00200     p = gc->bucket[key].first;
00201     while (p) {
00202         if (p->c == c)
00203             return p;
00204         p = p->next;
00205     }
00206     return NULL;
00207 }
00208 
00209 GlyphBLF *blf_glyph_add(FontBLF *font, unsigned int index, unsigned int c)
00210 {
00211     FT_GlyphSlot slot;
00212     GlyphBLF *g;
00213     FT_Error err;
00214     FT_Bitmap bitmap, tempbitmap;
00215     int sharp = (U.text_render & USER_TEXT_DISABLE_AA);
00216     FT_BBox bbox;
00217     unsigned int key;
00218 
00219     g = blf_glyph_search(font->glyph_cache, c);
00220     if (g)
00221         return g;
00222 
00223     if (sharp)
00224         err = FT_Load_Glyph(font->face, (FT_UInt)index, FT_LOAD_TARGET_MONO);
00225     else
00226         err = FT_Load_Glyph(font->face, (FT_UInt)index, FT_LOAD_TARGET_NORMAL | FT_LOAD_NO_HINTING | FT_LOAD_NO_BITMAP); /* Sure about NO_* flags? */
00227     if (err)
00228         return NULL;
00229 
00230     /* get the glyph. */
00231     slot = font->face->glyph;
00232 
00233     if (sharp) {
00234         err = FT_Render_Glyph(slot, FT_RENDER_MODE_MONO);
00235 
00236         /* Convert result from 1 bit per pixel to 8 bit per pixel */
00237         /* Accum errors for later, fine if not interested beyond "ok vs any error" */
00238         FT_Bitmap_New(&tempbitmap);
00239         err += FT_Bitmap_Convert(font->ft_lib, &slot->bitmap, &tempbitmap, 1); /* Does Blender use Pitch 1 always? It works so far */
00240         err += FT_Bitmap_Copy(font->ft_lib, &tempbitmap, &slot->bitmap);
00241         err += FT_Bitmap_Done(font->ft_lib, &tempbitmap);
00242     }
00243     else {
00244         err = FT_Render_Glyph(slot, FT_RENDER_MODE_NORMAL);
00245     }
00246 
00247     if (err || slot->format != FT_GLYPH_FORMAT_BITMAP)
00248         return NULL;
00249 
00250     g = (GlyphBLF *)MEM_callocN(sizeof(GlyphBLF), "blf_glyph_add");
00251     g->c = c;
00252     g->idx = (FT_UInt)index;
00253     g->xoff = -1;
00254     g->yoff = -1;
00255     bitmap = slot->bitmap;
00256     g->width = bitmap.width;
00257     g->height = bitmap.rows;
00258 
00259     if (g->width && g->height) {
00260         if (sharp) {
00261             /* Font buffer uses only 0 or 1 values, Blender expects full 0..255 range */
00262             int i;
00263             for (i = 0; i < (g->width * g->height); i++) {
00264                 bitmap.buffer[i] = 255 * bitmap.buffer[i];
00265             }
00266         }
00267 
00268         g->bitmap = (unsigned char *)MEM_mallocN(g->width * g->height, "glyph bitmap");
00269         memcpy((void *)g->bitmap, (void *)bitmap.buffer, g->width * g->height);
00270     }
00271 
00272     g->advance = ((float)slot->advance.x) / 64.0f;
00273     g->pos_x = slot->bitmap_left;
00274     g->pos_y = slot->bitmap_top;
00275     g->pitch = slot->bitmap.pitch;
00276 
00277     FT_Outline_Get_CBox(&(slot->outline), &bbox);
00278     g->box.xmin = ((float)bbox.xMin) / 64.0f;
00279     g->box.xmax = ((float)bbox.xMax) / 64.0f;
00280     g->box.ymin = ((float)bbox.yMin) / 64.0f;
00281     g->box.ymax = ((float)bbox.yMax) / 64.0f;
00282 
00283     key = blf_hash(g->c);
00284     BLI_addhead(&(font->glyph_cache->bucket[key]), g);
00285     return g;
00286 }
00287 
00288 void blf_glyph_free(GlyphBLF *g)
00289 {
00290     /* don't need free the texture, the GlyphCache already
00291      * have a list of all the texture and free it.
00292      */
00293     if (g->bitmap)
00294         MEM_freeN(g->bitmap);
00295     MEM_freeN(g);
00296 }
00297 
00298 static void blf_texture_draw(float uv[2][2], float dx, float y1, float dx1, float y2)
00299 {
00300     glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00301     glTexCoord2f(uv[0][0], uv[0][1]);
00302     glVertex2f(dx, y1);
00303     
00304     glTexCoord2f(uv[0][0], uv[1][1]);
00305     glVertex2f(dx, y2);
00306     
00307     glTexCoord2f(uv[1][0], uv[1][1]);
00308     glVertex2f(dx1, y2);
00309     
00310     glTexCoord2f(uv[1][0], uv[0][1]);
00311     glVertex2f(dx1, y1);
00312     glEnd();
00313 }
00314 
00315 static void blf_texture5_draw(const float shadow_col[4], float uv[2][2], float x1, float y1, float x2, float y2)
00316 {
00317     float soft[25] = {1/60.0f, 1/60.0f, 2/60.0f, 1/60.0f, 1/60.0f,
00318                       1/60.0f, 3/60.0f, 5/60.0f, 3/60.0f, 1/60.0f,
00319                       2/60.0f, 5/60.0f, 8/60.0f, 5/60.0f, 2/60.0f,
00320                       1/60.0f, 3/60.0f, 5/60.0f, 3/60.0f, 1/60.0f,
00321                       1/60.0f, 1/60.0f, 2/60.0f, 1/60.0f, 1/60.0f};
00322     
00323     float color[4], *fp = soft;
00324     int dx, dy;
00325 
00326     color[0] = shadow_col[0];
00327     color[1] = shadow_col[1];
00328     color[2] = shadow_col[2];
00329     
00330     for (dx = -2; dx < 3; dx++) {
00331         for (dy = -2; dy < 3; dy++, fp++) {
00332             color[3] = *(fp) * shadow_col[3];
00333             glColor4fv(color);
00334             blf_texture_draw(uv, x1+dx, y1+dy, x2+dx, y2+dy);
00335         }
00336     }
00337     
00338     glColor4fv(color);
00339 }
00340 
00341 static void blf_texture3_draw(const float shadow_col[4], float uv[2][2], float x1, float y1, float x2, float y2)
00342 {
00343     float soft[9] = {1/16.0f, 2/16.0f, 1/16.0f,
00344                      2/16.0f,4/16.0f, 2/16.0f,
00345                      1/16.0f, 2/16.0f, 1/16.0f};
00346 
00347     float color[4], *fp = soft;
00348     int dx, dy;
00349 
00350     color[0] = shadow_col[0];
00351     color[1] = shadow_col[1];
00352     color[2] = shadow_col[2];
00353 
00354     for (dx = -1; dx < 2; dx++) {
00355         for (dy = -1; dy < 2; dy++, fp++) {
00356             color[3] = *(fp) * shadow_col[3];
00357             glColor4fv(color);
00358             blf_texture_draw(uv, x1+dx, y1+dy, x2+dx, y2+dy);
00359         }
00360     }
00361     
00362     glColor4fv(color);
00363 }
00364 
00365 int blf_glyph_render(FontBLF *font, GlyphBLF *g, float x, float y)
00366 {
00367     float dx, dx1;
00368     float y1, y2;
00369     float xo, yo;
00370 
00371     if ((!g->width) || (!g->height))
00372         return 1;
00373 
00374     if (g->build_tex == 0) {
00375         GlyphCacheBLF *gc = font->glyph_cache;
00376 
00377         if (font->max_tex_size == -1)
00378             glGetIntegerv(GL_MAX_TEXTURE_SIZE, (GLint *)&font->max_tex_size);
00379 
00380         if (gc->cur_tex == -1) {
00381             blf_glyph_cache_texture(font, gc);
00382             gc->x_offs = gc->pad;
00383             gc->y_offs = gc->pad;
00384         }
00385 
00386         if (gc->x_offs > (gc->p2_width - gc->max_glyph_width)) {
00387             gc->x_offs = gc->pad;
00388             gc->y_offs += gc->max_glyph_height;
00389 
00390             if (gc->y_offs > (gc->p2_height - gc->max_glyph_height)) {
00391                 gc->y_offs = gc->pad;
00392                 blf_glyph_cache_texture(font, gc);
00393             }
00394         }
00395 
00396         g->tex = gc->textures[gc->cur_tex];
00397         g->xoff = gc->x_offs;
00398         g->yoff = gc->y_offs;
00399 
00400         glPushClientAttrib(GL_CLIENT_PIXEL_STORE_BIT);
00401         glPixelStorei(GL_UNPACK_LSB_FIRST, GL_FALSE);
00402         glPixelStorei(GL_UNPACK_ROW_LENGTH, 0);
00403         glPixelStorei(GL_UNPACK_ALIGNMENT, 1);
00404 
00405         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, g->tex);
00406         glTexSubImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, g->xoff, g->yoff, g->width, g->height, GL_ALPHA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, g->bitmap);
00407         glPopClientAttrib();
00408 
00409         g->uv[0][0] = ((float)g->xoff) / ((float)gc->p2_width);
00410         g->uv[0][1] = ((float)g->yoff) / ((float)gc->p2_height);
00411         g->uv[1][0] = ((float)(g->xoff + g->width)) / ((float)gc->p2_width);
00412         g->uv[1][1] = ((float)(g->yoff + g->height)) / ((float)gc->p2_height);
00413 
00414         /* update the x offset for the next glyph. */
00415         gc->x_offs += (int)(g->box.xmax - g->box.xmin + gc->pad);
00416 
00417         gc->rem_glyphs--;
00418         g->build_tex = 1;
00419     }
00420 
00421     xo = 0.0f;
00422     yo = 0.0f;
00423 
00424     if (font->flags & BLF_SHADOW) {
00425         xo = x;
00426         yo = y;
00427         x += font->shadow_x;
00428         y += font->shadow_y;
00429     }
00430 
00431     dx = floor(x + g->pos_x);
00432     dx1 = dx + g->width;
00433     y1 = y + g->pos_y;
00434     y2 = y + g->pos_y - g->height;
00435 
00436     if (font->flags & BLF_CLIPPING) {
00437         if (!BLI_in_rctf(&font->clip_rec, dx + font->pos[0], y1 + font->pos[1]))
00438             return 0;
00439         if (!BLI_in_rctf(&font->clip_rec, dx + font->pos[0], y2 + font->pos[1]))
00440             return 0;
00441         if (!BLI_in_rctf(&font->clip_rec, dx1 + font->pos[0], y2 + font->pos[1]))
00442             return 0;
00443         if (!BLI_in_rctf(&font->clip_rec, dx1 + font->pos[0], y1 + font->pos[1]))
00444             return 0;
00445     }
00446 
00447     if (font->tex_bind_state != g->tex) {
00448         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, (font->tex_bind_state = g->tex));
00449     }
00450 
00451     if (font->flags & BLF_SHADOW) {
00452 
00453         switch (font->shadow) {
00454             case 3:
00455                 blf_texture3_draw(font->shadow_col, g->uv, dx, y1, dx1, y2);
00456                 break;
00457             case 5:
00458                 blf_texture5_draw(font->shadow_col, g->uv, dx, y1, dx1, y2);
00459                 break;
00460             default:
00461                 glColor4fv(font->shadow_col);
00462                 blf_texture_draw(g->uv, dx, y1, dx1, y2);
00463                 break;
00464         }
00465 
00466         glColor4fv(font->orig_col);
00467 
00468         x = xo;
00469         y = yo;
00470 
00471         dx = floor(x + g->pos_x);
00472         dx1 = dx + g->width;
00473         y1 = y + g->pos_y;
00474         y2 = y + g->pos_y - g->height;
00475     }
00476 
00477     switch (font->blur) {
00478         case 3:
00479             blf_texture3_draw(font->orig_col, g->uv, dx, y1, dx1, y2);
00480             break;
00481         case 5:
00482             blf_texture5_draw(font->orig_col, g->uv, dx, y1, dx1, y2);
00483             break;
00484         default:
00485             blf_texture_draw(g->uv, dx, y1, dx1, y2);
00486             break;
00487     }
00488 
00489     return 1;
00490 }
